Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1987...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1990, off Edwin Benedetti (Min)...
Injured on 5/4/1990 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 6/15/1990, off Richard Rhames (DIA)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1991, hitting .565 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1991...
Injured on 9/25/1992 with a Ruptured Medial Collateral Ligament, out for full season...
